revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WMA11B |revision= |upc=745883555772 |asin=B00009PUM0 |fcc_date=10/03/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |availability= |type=digital media adapter, audio streamer, |fcc_id=M4Y-03251 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=PXA255;PXA255A0C200; |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C3BD70 |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400-7T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XI-325 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3873B |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-MMCX,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9000E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=AC'97 Codec;SigmaTel;STAC9750T;STAC9750T CC1A016 0331;1; ,,, 8-bit MCU;Elan Microelectronics;EM78P156EL;EMC EM78P156ELM, 0329W, BG37H1;1; ,,, TV Video Processor;Focus Enhancements;i-Net TV-FS450;i-Net TV-FS450 0040L KK604;1; |flags=composite A/V, S-Video, |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=linksys_wma11b |default_ssid_regex=^linksys_wma11b$ |default_ip=192.168.1.230 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:06:25 |oui_eth=00:06:25 }} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WMA11B}} {{â€¢}} [http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/userguide/wma11b_ug.pdf User's Guide]
''The firmware/driver for this product is no longer available for download. :We regret any inconvenience this may cause you.'' Lame.
*[http://download.modem-help.co.uk/mfcs-L/LinkSys/WMA11B/ WMA11B files on m-h] {{See also|Linksys WML11B}}
"GN00D" is silkscreened under the board under the ''[[SerComm]]''-esque label. :"MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreeened to the left of that. :''[[SerComm]]'' is the presumed OEM of this device.
The device is using the [http://pdf1.alldatasheet.com/datasheet-pdf/view/77314/INTEL/PXA255.html Intel PXA255 (''PXA255A0C200'')].
A '''Linksys''' MAC (rather than the card's default '''Z-Com''' MAC) would appear :to be used for the wireless interface. By default, this device will broadcast an SSID of '''linksys_wma11b''' in Ad-Hoc mode.
===Additional external links=== *[http://datasheet.seekic.com/PdfFile/EM7/EM78P156EL_EMC_ELAN_Microelectronics_Cor.pdf MCU ''EM78P156EL'' datasheet]
